item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: hyoromo has established the following Privacy Policy, established a system for the protection of personal information, and fully recognizes the importance of protecting personal information and promoting the protection of personal information. Personal Information Management In order to keep your personal information accurate and up-to-date, and to prevent unauthorized access, loss, damage, falsification, or leakage of personal information, hyoromo will take necessary measures such as maintaining a security system, improving the management system, and thoroughly training employees, and will implement security measures and strictly manage personal information.
